name: LOGistICAL: USA - Oregon
description: LOGistICAL: USA - Oregon is a large open-world, strategy, puzzle game where you transport different cargoes to complete all the towns throughout the state with over 300 towns to Complete. LOGistICAL: USA - Oregon game covers the US state of Oregon including cities like Portland, Eugene and Salem.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better Memory: 2 MB RAM Graphics: 256+MB with 1024x768 resolution Storage: 300 MB available space
